description:
Roberto confronts Kid Goldman about his claim that John Jordan was a prophet. Will Roberto successfully dispute his claim?
Source: amazon

titles.title: Only Through Death Can We Full Comprehend Rebirth into Eternal Life
Sache que par la mort seule tu renaîtras immortel
Shinu Koto ni Yotte Nomi, Eien no Seimei ni Yomigaeru Koto o Fukaku Satore
死ぬことによってのみ, 永遠の生命によみがえることを深く悟れ
죽음으로서만이 영생으로 부활한다는 것을 깊이 깨달을 지어다
